dashboard.label: Parent Anomalies: Office → PowerShell (T1059.001)
dashboard.description: Detect business app spawning PowerShell: WINWORD/EXCEL/OUTLOOK/POWERPNT → powershell.exe

search.query: (index=windows (sourcetype=lab:sysmon:csv OR sourcetype=lab:server4688:csv OR sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security)) (Image="*\powershell.exe" OR NewProcessName="*\powershell.exe") AND (ParentImage="*\WINWORD.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\EXCEL.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\OUTLOOK.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\POWERPNT.EXE") | timechart span=30m count

(index=windows (sourcetype=lab:sysmon:csv OR sourcetype=lab:server4688:csv OR sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security)) (Image="*\powershell.exe" OR NewProcessName="*\powershell.exe") AND (ParentImage="*\WINWORD.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\EXCEL.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\OUTLOOK.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\POWERPNT.EXE") | eval Child=coalesce(Image, NewProcessName) | stats count by ParentImage, Child | sort - count

(index=windows (sourcetype=lab:sysmon:csv OR sourcetype=lab:server4688:csv OR sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security)) (Image="*\powershell.exe" OR NewProcessName="*\powershell.exe") AND (ParentImage="*\WINWORD.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\EXCEL.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\OUTLOOK.EXE" OR ParentImage="*\POWERPNT.EXE") | eval cmd=coalesce(CommandLine, Message, _raw) | table _time, Computer, User, ParentImage, cmd | sort - _time
